categories: Category:Starships of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: This planetary command ship was a starship that was part of the resurgent Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY this command ship took part in and was destroyed during the battle of Kalandis Seven.

The Planetary command ship was first mentioned in Pablo Hidalgo's reference book The Essential Reader's Companion, which was released on October 2, 2012. The command ship first appears in Alexander Freed's short story The Last Battle of Colonel Jace Malcom which was published in Star Wars Insider 137 and released on October 23, 2012.
